trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> class contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Klasse enthält eine Auflistung von <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekten.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Der <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.#ctor" />-Konstruktor erstellt eine Instanz der <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: Das hinzuzufügende <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Add(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Add(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" />-Methode fügt der Auflistung ein <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt hinzu.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the collection where the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> was added.
trans-unit.target: Der nullbasierte Index in der Auflistung, der das <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> hinzugefügt wurde.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attribute" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attribute" /> ist ein NULL-Verweis (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified objects to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Fügt der aktuellen Auflistung die angegebenen Objekte hinzu.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ein Array von <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekten, die der Auflistung hinzugefügt werden sollen.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])" /> method adds an array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[])" />-Methode fügt der Auflistung ein Array von <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekten hinzu.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributes" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributes" /> ist ein NULL-Verweis (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: One of the members of <paramref name="attributes" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Einer der Member in <paramref name="attributes" /> ist ein NULL-Verweis (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> collection to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Auflistung, die dieser Auflistung hinzugefügt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection)" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.AddRange(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection)" />-Methode fügt der aktuellen Auflistung ein <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Objekt hinzu.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeCollection" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeCollection" /> ist ein NULL-Verweis (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt, nach dem gesucht werden soll.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Contains(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method determines whether this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object contains a specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Contains(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" />-Methode bestimmt, ob dieses <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Objekt ein angegebenes <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt enthält.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> is part of the collection; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, wenn das angegebene <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> Bestandteil der Auflistung ist, andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Das eindimensionale Array, in das die Elemente aus dem <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Objekt kopiert werden.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>array</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Der nullbasierte Index von <c>array</c>, an dem der Kopiervorgang beginnt.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.CopyTo(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.CopyTo(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification[],System.Int32)" />-Methode kopiert die gesamte Auflistung beginnend am angegebenen Index des Zielarrays in ein eindimensionales Array.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions
trans-unit.target: Ausnahmen

trans-unit.source: Exception
trans-unit.target: Ausnahme

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: Bedingung

trans-unit.source: ArgumentNullException
trans-unit.target: ArgumentNullException

trans-unit.source: `array` is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `array` ist ein NULL-Verweis (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: ArgumentOutOfRangeException
trans-unit.target: ArgumentOutOfRangeException

trans-unit.source: `index` is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: `index` ist kleiner als Null.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentException
trans-unit.target: ArgumentException

trans-unit.source: `array` is multidimensional
trans-unit.target: `array` ist mehrdimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - oder -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of the destination `array`.
trans-unit.target: Die Anzahl der Elemente in der Quell-<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> ist größer als der verfügbare Platz vom `index` bis zum Ende des Ziel-`array`s.

trans-unit.source: InvalidCastException
trans-unit.target: InvalidCastException

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination `array`.
trans-unit.target: Der Typ der Quell-<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection> kann nicht automatisch in den Typ des Ziel-`array` umgewandelt werden.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object for which the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Objekt, für das der Index zurückgegeben wird.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.IndexOf(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.IndexOf(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" />-Methode gibt den nullbasierten Index des ersten Vorkommens vom angegebenen <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt in der <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Auflistung zurück.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Der Indexwert des angegebenen <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekts, sofern dieses gefunden wird, andernfalls -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the collection at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Der nullbasierte Index in der Auflistung, an dem das <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt eingefügt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: Das einzufügende <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method inserts a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" />-Methode fügt ein <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt am angegebenen Index in die <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Auflistung ein.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> ist ein NULL-Verweis (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero, or <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> ist kleiner als 0 (null), oder <paramref name="index" /> ist größer als die Anzahl der Elemente im <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection" />-Objekt.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Der Indexwert des <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekts.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object at the specified <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Item(System.Int32)" />-Eigenschaft enthält das <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt am angegebenen <paramref name="index" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object at the specified <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: Das <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt am angegebenen <paramref name="index" />.

trans-unit.source: `value` is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), or `value` is not a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification> object.
trans-unit.target: `value` ist ein null-Verweis (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), oder `value` ist ein <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification> Objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: Das zu entfernende <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekt.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Remove(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" /> method removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModificationCollection.Remove(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification)" />-Methode entfernt das erste Vorkommen des angegebenen <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeModification" />-Objekts aus der Auflistung.
